statements: SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, bike_sharing_program FROM UserPreferences WHERE bike_sharing_program = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, carpooling_service FROM UserPreferences WHERE bike_sharing_program = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE carpooling_service = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, bike_sharing_program, carpooling_service FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, bike_sharing_program FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE carpooling_service = true
SELECT user_id FROM UserPreferences WHERE bike_sharing_program = true
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, bike_sharing_program FROM user_preferences WHERE bike_sharing_program = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, bike_sharing_program, carpooling_service FROM user_preferences WHERE carpooling_service = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, bike_sharing_program FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, carpooling_service FROM user_preferences WHERE bike_sharing_program = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, bike_sharing_program FROM user_preferences WHERE carpooling_service = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, (bike_sharing_rating + carpooling_rating) AS total_rating FROM user_ratings WHERE bike_sharing_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_ratings WHERE bike_sharing_rating < 3);
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE bike_sharing_program = TRUE AND carpooling_service = FALSE ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, bike_sharing_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT bike_id, bike_location FROM bike_sharing WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT carpool_id, carpool_route, capacity FROM carpooling ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE bike_sharing_preference = TRUE AND carpooling_preference = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, bike_sharing_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE bike_sharing_preference = TRUE
SELECT bike_location, availability FROM bike_sharing WHERE availability = TRUE
SELECT carpool_route, capacity FROM carpooling ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT user_id, bike_sharing_preference, carpooling_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE bike_sharing_preference = TRUE AND carpooling_preference = FALSE
SELECT * FROM bike_sharing LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM bike_sharing WHERE bike_location LIKE '%Central%';
SELECT carpool_id, starting_location, destination FROM carpooling ORDER BY carpool_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, preferred_transport FROM transportation_preferences WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE preference IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM bike_sharing WHERE bike_status = TRUE ORDER BY bike_location ASC;
SELECT user_profiles.username, carpooling.starting_location, carpooling.destination FROM user_profiles INNER JOIN carpooling ON user_profiles.user_id = carpooling.carpool_id;

SELECT user_profiles.username, transportation_preferences.preferred_transport FROM user_profiles INNER JOIN transportation_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = transportation_preferences.user_id WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM user_profiles
SELECT name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30
SELECT email FROM user_profiles WHERE name='John Doe'
SELECT program_name, location FROM bike_sharing_programs ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT service_name, capacity FROM carpooling_services WHERE available_seats > 0
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT user_id, address FROM user_profiles WHERE name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM bike_sharing_programs WHERE is_active = TRUE AND location = 'City Center'
SELECT * FROM carpooling_services WHERE capacity > 10 ORDER BY available_seats DESC
